content: we've open this https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues/63 in order to shape a first version of the expert map
please everyone, take a look at it and feel free to add more sections that worth having and if you feel you know something about an area add your name next to it

FYI I just used Github to submit a PR to the compiler-team repo, adding myself to the expert map under generators. Instead of submitting a PR (the correct option was definitely checked) it committed directly to master...
I can revert and submit a PR, if anyone cares
This is the second time Github has done this to me, there's a bug when you use the back button before submitting the form =/
Also, I'm not sure what the standards are for an expert, but figure it's best to lean on the side of adding more people

I think that's totally fine :)

Probably speaks to us not having branch protections enabled, but doesn't really matter that much.

I can revert and submit a PR, if anyone cares

don't worry
@tmandry can you also fill the directories attribute?
and if you feel like you can fill more parts of the map, help is more than welcome :)
@Santiago Pastorino sure, I guess I can nominate experts in other areas, too :)
